com.hamweather.aeris.communication.loaders
Class AerisAbstractTask

java.lang.Object
  
      com.hamweather.aeris.communication.CommunicationTask<AerisResponse>
          com.hamweather.aeris.communication.AerisCommunicationTask
              com.hamweather.aeris.communication.loaders.AerisAbstractTask
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdvisoriesTask, CountriesTask, EarthquakesTask, FiresTask, ForecastsTask, MoonphasesTask, NormalsStationsTask, NormalsTask, ObservationsArchiveTask, ObservationsRecentTask, ObservationsTask, PlacesAirportsTask, PlacesPostalcodesTask, PlacesTask, RecordsTask, StormCellsTask, StormReportsTask, SunmoonTask, TidesStationsTask, TidesTask
public abstract class AerisAbstractTask
extends AerisCommunicationTask

Abstract class that all specific endpoint tasks will use so that they can return the object in a friendly model versus have to know what response is being returned to you as by using the AerisCommunicationTask.

Author:
bcollins
